title: Wrong data set result returned when set an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When setting a filter expression like "row[0] equals to 0", an incorrect data set result is returned. Alternatively, when setting the filter, a null result set is returned.
OB: When setting a filter expression with "row[0] equals to" and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: An appropriate error message should be displayed when setting an invalid filter expression.
SR:
1. Set a filter in the data set with "row[0] equals to [any value]".
2. Click on the Preview tab.

Expected result: An appropriate error message should be displayed indicating that the filter expression is invalid.
